title: Hello Columbus: Reader-submitted vacation photos
text: Request to buy this photo Cuba From left, Bill and Casey Cseplo of Dublin and Sue Ann and Dave D’Antoni of Naples, Fla., visit the 16th-century Castillo San Felipe del Morro in Havana. The couples suggest taking small items such as soap bars, socks, and paper and pencils for the children of the teeming city. Alaska Kacie Lang, left, and Lori Lang of Hilliard stand on Ruth Glacier at Denali National Park and Preserve, Alaska. The travelers recommend taking a flight-seeing tour from Talkeetna to behold sights that can’t be seen on the ground. Massachusetts Jodie Meizlish and Keith Golden of Reynoldsburg take in the wonders of Boston’s Fenway Park, such as the Green Monster — the left-field wall. The baseball fans recommend getting seats in the shade for an afternoon Red Sox game. Sicily From left, Sophie, Lou, Louie, Bella, Jamie and Gina Perry of Powell pause atop Mount Etna, a volcano on the Italian island of Sicily. The family notes that the temperatures on the mountain can be 30 degrees lower than areas below, so pack warm clothes. Request to buy this photo Cuba From left, Bill and Casey Cseplo of Dublin and Sue Ann and Dave D’Antoni of Naples, Fla., visit the 16th-century Castillo San Felipe del Morro in Havana. The couples suggest taking small items such as soap bars, socks, and paper and pencils for the children of the teeming city.
